def submit():
    try:
        data = request.json
        content = data.get('content')
        page = data.get('page')
        user_id = get_or_create_user_id()
        print(f"收到提交请求:")
        print(f"  页面: {page}")
        print(f"  用户ID: {user_id}")
        print(f"  内容: {content}")
